name: Walking
description: Any exercise program should include cardiovascular exercise, which strengthens the heart and burns calories. And walking is something you can do anywhere, anytime, with no equipment other than a good pair of shoes.

name: Interval training
description: Whether you're a beginner or an exercise veteran, a walker or an aerobic dancer, adding interval training to your cardiovascular workout will boost your fitness level and help you lose weight.

name: Squats
description: Strength training is essential, the experts say. The more muscular fitness you have, says Cotton, the greater the capacity you have to burn calories.

name: Lunges
description: Like squats, lunges work all the major muscles of the lower body: gluteals, quadriceps, and hamstrings.

name: Push-ups
description: If done correctly, the push-up can strengthen the chest, shoulders, triceps, and even the core trunk muscles, all at one time.

name: Abdominal Crunches
description: Who doesn't want firm, flat abs? Experts say that when done correctly, the familiar crunch is a good choice to target them.
